word: H102 - אַגָּף - ʼaggâph - ag-gawf' - Bands - கட்டுகள்

sections.paragraph: a wing (of an army), a band, an army, hor des
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably from H5062 (through the idea of impending); a cover or heap; that is, (only plural) wings of an army, or crowds of troops: - bands.
